Name: PvZ2_Prerelease_ZenGarden_P3

Updates.en: Collect 3 boosts for each reinforce-mint plants to collect their medals, and the Reinforce-mint.
Updates.zh: 为每株防御家族植物收集 3 次爆发，为其获得相应的徽章，以及防御薄荷。

Updates.en: Added Aloe, Holly Knight, Caulipower, Gumnut, Reinforce-mint.
Updates.zh: 加入芦荟、冬青骑士、超能花菜、香果胶、防御薄荷。

Updates.en: Added Epic Levels for Reinforce-mint Family (Written by: 保罗-刘).
Updates.zh: 加入防御家族史诗关卡（作者：保罗-刘）。

Updates.en: Added 'Recommended Card Decks' and 'Challenging Card Decks' for most epic levels (created & tested by the community).
Updates.zh: 大部分史诗关卡加入“推荐卡组”、“挑战卡组”功能（由社区编写和测试）。

NewFeatures: 为每株防御家族植物收集 3 次爆发，为其获得相应的徽章，以及防御薄荷。
加入芦荟、冬青骑士、超能花菜、香果胶、防御薄荷。
加入防御家族史诗关卡（作者：保罗-刘）。
大部分史诗关卡加入“推荐卡组”、“挑战卡组”功能（由社区编写和测试）。
EnNewFeatures: Collect 3 boosts for each reinforce-mint plants to collect their medals, and the Reinforce-mint.
Added Aloe, Holly Knight, Caulipower, Gumnut, Reinforce-mint.
Added Epic Levels for Reinforce-mint Family (Written by: 保罗-刘).
Added 'Recommended Card Decks' and 'Challenging Card Decks' for most epic levels (created & tested by the community).
